titles.title: CB 12 One Thing Have I Desired of the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
ONE THING HAVE I DESIRED OF THE LORD,
That will I seek after: that I may dwell in the house
of the Lord all the days of my life;
To behold the beauty of the Lord and to inquire in
His temple; to behold the beauty of the Lord and
to inquire in His temple.
For in the time of trouble He shall hide me in His
pavilion; in the secret of His tabernacle shall He
hide me; He shall set me up upon a rock.
To behold the beauty of the Lord and to inquire in
His temple; to behold the beauty of the Lord and
to inquire in His temple.
